de.amr.plt.rcParkingRobot
Class IAndroidHmi.Position

java.lang.Object
  de.amr.plt.rcParkingRobot.IAndroidHmi.Position
Enclosing interface:
IAndroidHmi
public static class IAndroidHmi.Position
extends java.lang.Object

Contains all information about robot position and movement. The current position with X and Y location is related to start position in mm. Heading direction (angle) is given in degree, where zero degree is the the positive X axis, thus 90 degree is the positive Y axis etc. The distance to other objects is given for all directions front, back, left and right in mm. Finally it contains the speed in m/s.

This class is read-only.

Author:
PLT

IAndroidHmi.Position

public IAndroidHmi.Position(float x,
                            float y,
                            float angle,
                            double[] distance)
Creates a new Position.

Parameters:
x - X coordinate
y - Y coordinate
angle - heading angle
distance - distance measurements of all distance sensors in the order (front, right, back, left)

IAndroidHmi.Position

public IAndroidHmi.Position(PointF position,
                            float angle,
                            double[] distance)
Creates a new Position.

Parameters:
position - the current position with X and Y coordinate and heading angle
angle - heading angle
distance - distance measurements of all distance sensors in the order (front, right, back, left)
